title: The Mind's Mirror
description: Tap the wisdom of your dreams to discover how dreams guide you to activate your potential. Kari Hohne, popular radio dream analyst, shares her 30+ years of experience in this newly revised and updated edition. One third of your life is spent exploring your identity and direction in the topsy turvy world of dreams and symbols. As if you have entered a world of mirrors, nothing is as it appears to be and all you encounter becomes a reflection of you. When you are lost, dreams reveal the way through crisis as if some aspect of your mind knows you better than you know yourself. Filled with the symbolic treasures that can offer insight into your real identity, this Dream Dictionary and Translation Guide allows you to retrace your steps into you nightly adventures to discover how dreams actively lead you to fulfill your destiny.
author: Kari Hohne
